msbt.message:
I was so surprised by all the cards you sent! It was the most I ever got!
Here's a prize!
My mailbox was stuffed fulla cards and presents! Was it my birthday and I forgot? Or was it my MAILBOX'S birthday? When is YOUR mailbox's birthday? Here's a present, in case it's today!
I fell asleep trying to read through all your cards! I drooled in my sleep, and woke up with a couple cards stuck to my face! It was neat! Here's a present because I like ya!
Thanks for the cards! It made me so happy seeing how many you sent me. I built a card tower out of them! I'm clumsy so it wasn't real tall. It's fun to do anyway!
Thanks for all the cards! I kept looking at them and talking to the bugs about them and I forgot to sleep! I didn't forget to eat though! I ate a whole bag of chips. The whole bag!

I was so worried that all of the cards you sent were supposed to be in a certain order. I spent ALL NIGHT talking with the bugs in the wall and the bugs in the floor, and we think we've got it figured it out.
